attributes.action: Reverse the UK Governments decision to classify Israeli Goods produced in Judea & Samaria (West Bank) as made in Palestine, a country that does not exist.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This proposed 'classification' of Israeli produced goods in this region will not only punish Israeli companies operating there but many Israeli Arabs who are employed by these companies. This decision of the Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs is insensitive, ignorant and anti-Israel in its implications. We call upon the UK Government to reverse this decision.
